official_title: A bill to remove the Yucca Mountain Site in the State of Nevada from consideration as a repository for high-level radioactive waste.

summary.text: Prohibits the authorization or expenditure of any funds for site characterization activities for a nuclear waste repository site at the Yucca Mountain Site in the State of Nevada.

titles.title: A bill to remove the Yucca Mountain Site in the State of Nevada from consideration as a repository for high-level radioactive waste.
